comment: Dr Zamani is hands down the best teacher I've had. Made even the hardest environmental tech topics feel easy to understand. So caring. Her great energy makes class fun. I look forward to going to class because of how she teaches.

She was a very good teacher for my class. I did the summer design class so we had daily diagramming and powerpoints for grading. She seemed pretty understanding of the students time. She also loved feedback from us. One thing I didnt like is that she wasnt exactly clear about she wanted but I managed to pass the class with an A.

This class is project based with not quizzes and tests and is a lot of work. Every week you have a reading with a  corresponding project to turn in and then a midterm and final project. She it not good at explaining concepts and clarifying the material for students and can be a little vague. But overall I liked the class.

She first started off changing the date and time of the class. She also showed up late and canceled multiple classes. I didn't learn a single thing from her. It was mostly doing readings and a PowerPoint. I felt like I was teaching myself. I only took the class because it was mandatory. The course was easy, but I suggest not taking her.

You will have to do readings and a PowerPoint over the readings every week. Professor Zamani was very unorganized and scatterbrained. She was late on some days but got upset when students were late. She doesn't grade each PowerPoint separately and she posts her lecture notes very late. The class itself is very easy, but don't have her as a teacher.

Well it started off with her changing the date and time of the class. I was not a huge fan. Then it progressed into not learning anything from her. The class is just us doing research and creating powerpoints. It felt honestly like we were teaching her. For a special topic/elective type class, it felt like there was more to do than a studio class.

Super sweet and was very lenient with the time to finish assignments. She posts powerpoints and readings every week and you have to create a discussion post and respond to a few peers. You also have to create a PowerPoint with new information pertaining to your readings. Its easy and you have a lot of time.

The only complaint I can give is that as of now (8 weeks into the semester) she has not put in a single grade in D2L. Her teaching style is fine. She has said "If I haven't spoken to you yet, your grade is doing okay. This is as specific as she has been when it comes to grades but, again, that is my only complaint.

I took with her ARCH 3314, a lecture heavy course. She made the course simpler with a variety of resources. Cared for our suggestions and reviewed our evaluations. Dr. Zamani is very organized and active. Always helpful and accessible outside the class. I will take her again.

Just one of those classes you have to get through. Shes a bit of a prima donna, where it is either her way or the highway. She claims E-Tech is her favorite subject, but she cancels half the classes each semester although we pay for twice as many classes. Not sure why the college allows this....

I highly recommend her Envotmnrtal Technolgy course. Amazing lectures and a great professor. Her focus is on sustainability, so re below comment: Yes, the first year is not her interest! She is so busy with many things but still extremely helpful, and accessible outside the class. Well organized, and clear. Her exams are fair and straight.
Excellent semester with her!

This year zamani taught first year intro and from the beginning she made it known that she was not meant to. Often times she seemed to be impatient with us and there were many times that she did not even come to class. On top of this, she changed the meeting times of the class from 2 to 1 day a week. Her instructions are vague and very unclear.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Her Environmental Technology class was so informative and clear ! I love the way she is teaching this course. She made us go to class once a week and all we did is studying for her straight forward test online (multiple choice) and do one project throughout the semester. I loved her accent because it similar to mine. Highly recommended !!
Super enthusiastic. Demanding but her course opened up a whole new world for me. Absolutely love her as a professor and person!
Care and compassion for students can't be found here.

Allows students to be creative and encourages them to think outside the box. She is not afraid to be different in a positive way. Her studio was confusing at times, often unorganized especially with the schedule, but overall she's a great teacher that I would recommend.

Zamani is very intelligent and has high expectations for her students. She becomes more open and fun as the semester goes. She also makes you think very hard. She is know to have some of the best work coming into competition from her students. If you are looking for an easy studio class, look else where or different major.

Active. Thinks out of the box. Does not believe to the conservative ways of teaching; so do not take her if u need someone who treats students in a high school style with an attendance sheet, etc. Our class lab projects were the best.

Very quick to insult students without providing guidance. Very friendly and helpful when she gets what she wants, acts like a whinny 10 year old school girl when she does not get what she wants. Extremely unprofessional, does not follow school guidelines with, well, anything; conduct, attendance, ethics, etc. Avoid if you value quality education.
Very knowledgeable, very helpful, very intelligent.i recommend her.Might be a little hard to understand her in the beginning but you will get use to her accent.

Vague about assignments and leaves a lot of students confused about what she really wants. Supports the big idea more than the development of the idea. Likes to play favorites and if she doesn't like what you are doing then it sucks for you.
very  helpful makes suggestions to every student tries to get you to think but is very nice about it got a B
